author: ate
msg: SCXML-203: Calculation of states to be entered can be depending on states to be exited and thereby also their possible history
- fixing this bug by temporarily pre-recording the histories of exited states in the Step
- this allows to still ensure that the resulting active states represent a valid configuration, before actually taking the step
- also cleanup and improve the naming of the state history management APIs
